text:
Thanks for the heads up.
I would like to play around a bit, check their full potential, and see how close they are to our customers’ needs. since it is not launched yet, where do I start?

Just out of interest, would any providers who have an approved theme be willing to share a link?

We have an old client who’s looking for a marketplace solution for their new website - I advised them to hold out and opt for a theme, so it would be great to show them a few :smile:

We also have a customer that wanted to get a template pack from marketplace and we told them to wait till June 1st for new themes to arrive. So would be nice if those who have their themes approved can share a link

Hey <@UHJM7AW02> and <@UF6U20T3K> I just released my version of the CLEAN Theme. Here is the link.  <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/marketplace/products/design-with-speed/clean-6-1-theme|https://app.HubSpot.com/l/marketplace/products/design-with-speed/clean-6-1-theme>

<@UHJM7AW02> <@UF6U20T3K> My HubSpot CMS Theme - Drive - launched yesterday - have a peek!
<https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/driveagency/drive>
